## R Markdown

install.packages("UsingR")
library(UsingR)
data(ewr)

```{r}
MS=read.csv("C:/temp/week6/mathstat.csv", header = T)
MS
head(MS)
dim(MS)
stem(MS$maths)
stem(MS$stats)
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(MS$maths);hist(MS$stats)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
stem(MS$maths)
stem(MS$stats)

EDA<- function(x)
{
  par(mfrow=c(2,2))
  hist(x)
  density(x)
  dotchart(x)
  boxplot(x,horizontal=T)
  qqnorm(x);qqline(x)
  par(mfrow=c(1,1))
}

EDA(MS$maths)
```
## 將EDA存成函數方便計算 >> 額外存
```{r}
MS=read.csv("C:/temp/week6/mathstat.csv", header = T)
MS
head(MS)
dim(MS)
stem(MS$maths)
stem(MS$stats)
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(MS$maths);hist(MS$stats)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
stem(MS$maths)
stem(MS$stats)

source("EDA.R")
EDA(MS$maths)
EDA(MS$stats)
```
